result.arabic_text: مَا سَمِعۡنَا بِهَٰذَا فِي ٱلۡمِلَّةِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخۡتِلَٰقٌ
result.translation: (7) We have not heard of this in the latest religion.[1319] This is not but a fabrication.
result.footnotes: [1319]- Referring to Christianity or possibly the pagan religion of the Quraysh.
